name: Yes Wentworth Miller is cute but.....
reviewBody:
This t.v show has so much more going for it than the delicious Wentworth Miller and Dominic Percell. There is intrigue, excitement, great characters and essentially a storyline that could be developed and extended for a long time. 

The writing is clever and although not everything is believable (the guy notices everything so why does he need a telephone number tattooed on his arm - even i remember telephone numbers!!!) lets face it, it is just good old fashioned entertainment.

I am totally hooked. 

I'd say give it a go. Even if it is just for 45 minutes to watch some nice looking men in some well fitted prison outfits!!
